channel.title: Blast Pit Crash
channel.description: Every time I start the giant fan in Blast Pit, the game just crashes. Not really sure why. Also, I've noticed that the game crashes if it is minimized while loading. This happens every time Game Booster 3 minimizes it to boost the game. Small and unrelated, but I thought I would throw it in there as well. Other than that, the game is absolute perfection. I've been enjoying it so far. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T16_32_25C0.mdmp (101 KB)

item.title: Blast Pit Crash
item.dc:creator: majicm9
item.description:
Every time I start the giant fan in Blast Pit, the game just crashes. Not really sure why.

Also, I’ve noticed that the game crashes if it is minimized while loading. This happens every time Game Booster 3 minimizes it to boost the game. Small and unrelated, but I thought I would throw it in there as well.

Other than that, the game is absolute perfection. I’ve been enjoying it so far.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T16_32_25C0.mdmp (101 KB)

Read full topic
